scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development babel --watch app -d build > /dev/null 2>&1 & NODE_PATH=./build nodemon app/server.js
scripts.start:prod: npx pm2 start build/server.js --name vendor_api_production -i max
scripts.db:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:create --env development
scripts.db:drop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env development
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development
scripts.db:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.db:migrate:undo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env development --name
scripts.db:seed:undo: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --env development --seed
